Real Name: Vic Sage
Special Powers
PLEASE, I GO THROUGH EVERYONE'S TRASH: When an opposing character within 6 squares uses Outwit, Perplex, or Probability Control, if there's no d6 on this card, after resolutions roll a d6 and place the result on this card. // When a character within 6 squares makes an attack roll, you may remove the d6 from this card and replace a die in the roll with it.
BINARY GAS: Smoke Cloud. Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate 1 marker. // Friendly characters occupying hindering terrain markers generated by The Question can use Shape Change.
